text.value: Enter the date of the visit
After reaching the school, meet the Principal, ask the following question and submit their responses
Has the Principal received the amount of â‚¹ 2 lac for prefabrication of the Incubation Center?
Has the Principal received approval for the cost estimate from the Executive Engineer (B&R)?
Visit the Incubation Center in the school. Submit the response for each question after observing the Incubation Center. Also click and submit a photo for each question
What is the status of white-washing of the Incubation Center
Click a photo of the walls of the Incubation Center
What is the status of installing the aluminium partition in the Incubation Center?
Click a photo of the area of the alumnium partition
What is the status of arranging provisions for installing a split AC?
Click a photo showing the provisions for the split AC
What is the status of installing sufficient plug points and adapters, as per requirements of the Incubation Center?
Click a photo capturing the plug points and adapters
What is the status of arranging provisions for installing a base for the electricity generator in the Incubation Center?
Click a photo of the base of the electrcity generator
What is the status of installing the 'DAKSH' board at the main entrance?
Click a photo of the 'DAKSH' board

select1.hint: The funds were transferred on 15th February, 2021
After receiving the funds, Principals have to get a costing approval from the Executive Engineer (B&R)
All Principals have to ensure that the walls of the Incubation Center have been white-washed with the funds provided
As per the layout provided, alumnium partitions have to be installed in the Incubatio Centers

upload.hint: If the aluminium partition has not been installed, click a photo of the area where it is supposed to be installed

select1.hint: Space where the split AC is to be installed should be identified and plugs and adapters should be installed

upload.hint: If the provisions for the split AC have not be arranged, click a photo of where the AC is supposed to be installed

select1.hint: Power plugs have to be installed for the equipment in all Incubation Centers

upload.hint: If the plug points and adapters have not been installed, click a photo of where the plug points and adapters are supposed to be installed

select1.hint: A base has to be created upon which the electricity generator will be kept

upload.hint: If the electricity generator has not been installed, click a photo of where it should be installed

select1.hint: Based on the design sent, the DAKSH board has to be created and put up at the entrance of the Incubation Center

upload.hint: If the 'DAKSH' board has not been installed, click a photo of the entrance where it is supposed to be installed
